about_the_game:
🐾 Welcome to Kitty Convenience – The Purrfect Co-op Challenge! 🐾

Step into the paws of an adorable kitty crew and work together to run the busiest convenience store in town! Whether you’re playing solo, with friends or as a family, Kitty Convenience blends cozy chaos with teamwork in a fast-paced retail adventure. With difficulty options ranging from a relaxed Kitten Mode to high-stakes competitive play, there’s something for every cat lover!

🛒 Run the Ultimate Convenience Store!

Stock shelves, price items, assist customers and clean up spills, all while adapting to an ever-changing store layout! Quick thinking, communication and teamwork are the keys to keeping the store running smoothly.

🐱 Play Your Way – Game Modes for Every Player

  • Kitten Mode (Ages 3-6) – A simplified, stress-free version designed for young players. Perfect for little ones to enjoy at their own pace!

  • Little Sibling Mode – Player One takes on all the responsibility while their little helper plays a fun, supportive role with simplified mechanics. Perfect for families that want to include younger players without the added stress!

  • Family Game Night Mode – A lighthearted, cooperative experience with a low challenge level. Great for unwinding before bedtime!

  • Challenge Your Friends Mode – Think you’ve mastered running the store? Crank up the difficulty and put your teamwork to the test in high-speed, high-stakes gameplay!

🎮 Local & Online Multiplayer

Play together in chaotic couch co-op or connect online with up to four players! To keep things fun and family-friendly, online multiplayer features emote-only communication.

🏪 Expect the Unexpected!

No two shifts are the same! Navigate moving aisles, shifting displays and surprise store events that will keep you on your paws. Can you adapt to the ever-changing store layout and keep customers happy?

🎨 Join the Community & Leave Your Mark!

Be part of our community-driven experience by participating in weekly competitions! Submit artwork, music or creative ideas for a chance to have your designs featured in the game. Win cool prizes, unlock exclusive in-game content and help shape the world of Kitty Convenience!

🐾 Are you ready to take on the ultimate convenience store challenge or just enjoy a relaxing shift with family? Your shift starts meow! 😸🎮

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6GB) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended for smoother gameplay
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required for optimal performance, ray tracing-enabled GPUs recommended for enhanced visuals
